§ 2306. Special rule In the case of a local community in which no employees are represented by a labor organization, for purposes of this chapter, the term “representatives of employees” shall be substituted for “labor organization”. (Pub. L. 88–210, § 7, as added Pub. L. 109–270, § 1(b), Aug. 12, 2006, 120 Stat. 690.)
Editorial Notes Prior ProvisionsA prior section 2306, Pub. L. 88–210, § 7, as added Pub. L. 105–332, § 1(b), Oct. 31, 1998, 112 Stat. 3083, related to special rule, prior to the general amendment of this chapter by Pub. L. 109–270.
